      • newShader

        public abstract Shader newShader(java.lang.String path)
        Loads a shader at the specified path. Note: only provide the shader name, e.g. for the following files
        path/myshader.frag.glsl
        path/myshader.vert.glsl
        path/myshader.fx
        you would pass in path/myshader as the path
        Parameters:
        path - The shader path
        Returns:
        The platform-specific implementation of Shader

      • newFrameBuffer

        public abstract FrameBuffer newFrameBuffer(int width,
                                           int height)

      • newCustomCursor

        public abstract CustomCursor newCustomCursor(Pixmap upPixmap,
                                             Pixmap downPixmap,
                                             int xHotspot,
                                             int yHotspot)
        Creates a new custom mouse cursor. This class must be set as the InputProcessor or added to a InputMultiplexer.
        Parameters:
        upPixmap - The image to use in the mouse button up state
        downPixmap - The image to use in the mouse button down state
        xHotspot - The x location of the hotspot pixel within the cursor image (origin top-left corner)
        yHotspot - The y location of the hotspot pixel within the cursor image (origin top-left corner)

        public abstract SpriteCache newSpriteCache()
